DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the effects of Aubagio on changes in the brain using MRI.
DOC.brief_title: Th Effects of Aubagio on Brain Pathology in Multiple Sclerosis Studied Over 12 Months
DOC.detailed_description: Patients who take Aubagio will have an MRI, eye test, have blood taken, and complete a questionnaire on environmental risk factors to evaluate changes in the brain and on disease progression. A healthy control group will also complete the same testing regimen.
